title: Signet Ring
description:
Signet ring of pale green faience. The top is in the form of a large loop. Bezel: solid with loop, extremely elongated, in shape of cartouche bearing sunk relief inscription. The base is in the shape of a cartouche and is inscribed with text. Elongated bezel inscribed with epithets of Atum. Loop: thick flat on onside, rounded on outside. 
Condition: Piece chipped from upper end of cartouche.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
